coded_answer.p: I am the person who won your competition and I am writing in reply to your letter.
First of all, I can travel only in julyJuly because that is the only time when I am free from my examinations.
I prefer staying in a tent as I am used to it and find it more comfortable.

The two activities I would like to do in the camp are swimming and photography. I am a good swimmer and I hadhave some expirienceexperience in photography however. However, I have very mucha lot to learn.
Finally, I have got two questions to ask you. How much money and how many clothes should I take with me?
I am very grateful for your prize and looking forward to visiting the camp.
I think that bits from the whole school day should be filmed. This will show how the school lives.
In the morning prefects make sure that everybody is awake and already up. At the assembly students are told about changes in the timetable and activities for the whole day.

In the computing department studentstudents learn about informationalinformation technologies. The main job of the head of the computing department is not to teach but to keep the computers working properly.
Maths is the most popular subject in the school. Mathematics teachers do a great deal of work and have almost no time to prepare lessons.
In the chemistry lab experiments are often set up. The teacher looks after the pupilpupils while they are investigating the topic of the lesson.
Meals are very important. KitchenThe kitchen staff works hard to provide students with a variety of food.
The video can be finishedfinish with a view of the school from outside.
